title: Alu tamatar masala
ingredients: 2.5cm piece of gingerpeeled and finely chopped

title: Asparagus & lemon spaghetti with peas
ingredients: 2leeks(220g), cut into lengths, then thin strips

title: Aubergine & chickpea bites

title: Baked vegan cheesecake with raspberries & clementine

ingredients: 250graw beetrootpeeled and cut into small chunks
½butternut squashpeeled and cut into small chunks

title: Black bean chilli

2 x 400g (2 x 14oz)cans black beansrinsed and drained
a few, or one, of the following to serve: crumbledfeta cheese (or a dairy-free alternative)chopped spring onions, sliced radishes, avocado chunks, soured cream

title: Vegan banh mi
ingredients: 150gleftover raw veggies(such as red cabbage and carrots), shredded
½ small packcorianderleaves picked, to serve
½ small packmintleaves picked, to serve

title: Butter beans with kale, lemon, chilli & garlic
ingredients: ½-1 tsp chilli flakesor to taste

title: Carrot & caraway crackers

½ small packdillleaves picked, to serve
20veg crisps(we used a small bag of Tyrells), to serve

title: Chickpea, tomato & spinach curry

title: Vegan waffles with maple & soy mushrooms
Easy vegan nut roast
ingredients: 400gbutternut squashpeeled, deseeded and cut into 3cm chunks
3 tbspolive oilplus extra for the tin
200g shelledpistachiosroughly chopped, plus extra to serve

bananaslices, blueberries, maple syrup, vegan chocolate chips, plant-based yogurt

title: Goan-style vegetable curry with kitchari

title: Hasselback potatoes

title: Mint & basil griddled peach salad

title: Easy vegan wellington

title: Mushroom & potato curry

ingredients: 1large red chillihalved, deseeded and finely sliced

title: Speedy lentil coconut curry

title: Spinach, sweet potato & lentil dhal

title: Squash & barley salad with balsamic vinaigrette

title: Tomato soup

title: Vegan baked oats

title: Vegan apple cake

350gself-raising flourplus 1 tbsp to coat the apples

oat-based vegan creamor custard, to serve

225gplain flour(or use self-raising flour and reduce the baking powder to 2 heaped tsp)

colourful sprinkles(make sure they're suitable for vegans), to decorate (optional)

title: Vegan flapjacks

title: Vegan ginger loaf cake

title: Vegan katsu curry

title: Vegan kebabs with avocado dressing

title: Vegan mince pies

title: Vegan naan

title: Vegan pie
ingredients: 1 tbspvegan red wine vinegar(we used Aspall)
3beetroots(about 400g), peeled and sliced into rounds about 0.5cm thick

title: Vegan pizza Margherita
ingredients: 500gstrong white bread flourplus extra for dusting
Freshbasilor oregano leaves, chilli oil and vegan parmesan to serve (optional)

title: Vegan rainbow spring rolls

title: Vegan ramen
ingredients: thumb-sized piecegingersliced, plus a few slices cut into fine matchsticks to serve (optional)

2spring onionsfinely sliced, white and green parts kept separate
sesame oilsriracha, chopped coriander, crushed peanuts, crumbled sheets of nori or dried chilli threads (silgochu), to serve (optional)

title: Vegan sausage rolls
ingredients: 1 x 320g sheet ready-rolledpuff pastry(not the all-butter version)
dairy-free milk(like soya milk), to glaze

title: Vegan scones
ingredients: vegan creamalternative, e.g. oat-based crème fraîche, to serve

title: Vegan shepherd's pie

30gdried porcinimushrooms, soaked in hot water for 15 mins, then drained (reserve the liquid)

½ small packsageleaves picked and roughly chopped

title: Vegan simnel cake
ingredients: 250gmixed dried fruit(we used sultanas, raisins and candied peel)
25gapricot jamwarmed, plus extra for sticking the marzipan balls to the cake

title: Vegan Thai curry
ingredients: 2lemongrassstalks, tough outer leaves removed, core finely chopped

title: Vegan Thai green curry
ingredients: 1 tbspThai green curry paste(check the label to make sure it’s vegetarian/ vegan)

title: Vegan waffles
ingredients: 125gvegan butterplus extra for the waffle iron

title: Vegetable stew
ingredients: 250gcooked puy lentils(we used Merchant Gourmet ready-to-eat puy lentils)
